comment.author: 13706945@N00
comment._content:
Information from the CWGC database:

BELL, WILLIAM

Rank: Second Lieutenant
Date of Death: 03/05/1917
Regiment/Service: 5th Bn. attd. 8th Bn., Black Watch (Royal Highlanders)
Memorial: Arras Memorial, Pas de Calais, France 
Panel Reference: Bay 6.
Additional Information: Brother of Robert Bell, of Dundee Saw Mills, Dundee.

comment.author: 16074369@N07
comment._content: Likely the 2nd Lt. Wm. Bell listed on the Dundee High School memorial.

comment.author: 13706945@N00
comment._content: Possibly also on other memorials in Dundee, e.g. St Mary's Parish Church: www.fdca.org.uk/pdf%20files/WW1MemorialsB.pdf

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Second Lieutenant William Ernest Bell Death: May 3, 1917 Inscription: Black Watch (Royal Highlanders) Burial: Faubourg-d'Amiens Cemetery Arras Departement du Pas-de-Calais Nord-Pas-de-Calais, France Plot: Bay 6. www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=bell&a...;
